<!-- This goes in the survey google sheet block for reading in the doe -->

```{r message=FALSE}
root <- 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jhelvy/tmfConjoint/master/survey/pilot2/survey/'
source(paste(root, 'functions.R', sep=''))
doe <- fread(paste(root, 'doe/trips/', respondentID, '.csv', sep=''))

# Filter out the alternatives
trip1 <- doe[(altID == 1) & (qID == 1)]
trip2 <- doe[(altID == 2) & (qID == 1)]
trip3 <- doe[(altID == 3) & (qID == 1)]
```
(1 of 5) If these were your only options for this trip, which would you choose?


<!-- This goes in the survey google sheet block for creating a choice option -->

**Option 1**
**Price**: $ `r trip1$price`
**Total Trip Time**: `r trip1$tripTimeRange`
```{r fig.height=4, fig.width=2}

```

**Option 2**
**Price**: $ `r trip2$price`
**Total Trip Time**: `r trip2$tripTimeRange`
```{r fig.height=4, fig.width=2}
makePlot(trip2)
```

**Option 1**
**Price**: $ `r trip3$price`

